TemplateInfo.Description: An empty project template for creating an ASP.NET Core application. This template does not have any content in it.
TemplateInfo.Name: ASP.NET Core Empty

Framework.Description: The target framework for the project.

IncludeLaunchSettings.Description: Whether to include launchSettings.json in the generated template.

KestrelPort.Description: Port number to use to configure Kestrel in launchSettings.json.

IISExpressPort.Description: Port number to use to configure IIS Express in launchSettings.json.

skipRestore.Description: If specified, skips the automatic restore of the project on create.

TemplateInfo.Author: Microsoft
TemplateInfo.Description: A project template for creating an ASP.NET Core application with example ASP.NET Razor Pages content
TemplateInfo.Name: ASP.NET Core Web App

auth.Description: The type of authentication to use

ChoicesAndDescriptions.IndividualB2C: Individual authentication with Azure AD B2C
ChoicesAndDescriptions.SingleOrg: Organizational authentication for a single tenant

Framework.Description: The target framework for the project.

AAdB2CInstance.Description: The Azure Active Directory B2C instance to connect to (use with IndividualB2C auth).

SignUpSignInPolicyId.Description: The sign-in and sign-up policy ID for this project (use with IndividualB2C auth).

ResetPasswordPolicyId.Description: The reset password policy ID for this project (use with IndividualB2C auth).

EditProfilePolicyId.Description: The edit profile policy ID for this project (use with IndividualB2C auth).

AADInstance.Description: The Azure Active Directory instance to connect to (use with SingleOrg or MultiOrg auth).

ClientId.Description: The Client ID for this project (use with IndividualB2C, SingleOrg or MultiOrg auth).

Domain.Description: The domain for the directory tenant (use with SingleOrg or IndividualB2C auth).

TenantId.Description: The TenantId ID of the directory to connect to (use with SingleOrg auth).

CallbackPath.Description: The request path within the application's base path of the redirect URI (use with SingleOrg or IndividualB2C auth).

OrgReadAccess.Description: Whether or not to allow this application read access to the directory (only applies to SingleOrg or MultiOrg auth).

UserSecretsId.Description: The ID to use for secrets (use with OrgReadAccess or Individual auth).

IncludeLaunchSettings.Description: Whether to include launchSettings.json in the generated template.

skipRestore.Description: If specified, skips the automatic restore of the project on create.

UseBrowserLink.Description: Whether or not to include BrowserLink in the project

HttpsPort.Description: Port number to use to configure SSL in launchSettings.json.

KestrelPort.Description: Port number to use to configure Kestrel in launchSettings.json.

IISExpressPort.Description: Port number to use to configure IIS Express in launchSettings.json.

UseLocalDB.Description: Whether to use LocalDB instead of SQLite. This option only applies if --auth Individual or --auth IndividualB2C is specified.

TemplateInfo.Author: Microsoft
TemplateInfo.Description: A project template for creating an ASP.NET Core application with example ASP.NET Core MVC Views and Controllers. This template can also be used for RESTful HTTP services.
TemplateInfo.Name: ASP.NET Core Web App (Model-View-Controller)

auth.Description: The type of authentication to use

ChoicesAndDescriptions.IndividualB2C: Individual authentication with Azure AD B2C
ChoicesAndDescriptions.SingleOrg: Organizational authentication for a single tenant

Framework.Description: The target framework for the project.

AAdB2CInstance.Description: The Azure Active Directory B2C instance to connect to (use with IndividualB2C auth).

SignUpSignInPolicyId.Description: The sign-in and sign-up policy ID for this project (use with IndividualB2C auth).

ResetPasswordPolicyId.Description: The reset password policy ID for this project (use with IndividualB2C auth).

EditProfilePolicyId.Description: The edit profile policy ID for this project (use with IndividualB2C auth).

AADInstance.Description: The Azure Active Directory instance to connect to (use with SingleOrg or MultiOrg auth).

ClientId.Description: The Client ID for this project (use with IndividualB2C, SingleOrg or MultiOrg auth).

Domain.Description: The domain for the directory tenant (use with SingleOrg or IndividualB2C auth).

TenantId.Description: The TenantId ID of the directory to connect to (use with SingleOrg auth).

CallbackPath.Description: The request path within the application's base path of the redirect URI (use with SingleOrg or IndividualB2C auth).

OrgReadAccess.Description: Whether or not to allow this application read access to the directory (only applies to SingleOrg or MultiOrg auth).

UserSecretsId.Description: The ID to use for secrets (use with OrgReadAccess or Individual auth).

IncludeLaunchSettings.Description: Whether to include launchSettings.json in the generated template.

UseBrowserLink.Description: Whether or not to include BrowserLink in the project

HttpsPort.Description: Port number to use to configure SSL in launchSettings.json.

KestrelPort.Description: Port number to use to configure Kestrel in launchSettings.json.

IISExpressPort.Description: Port number to use to configure IIS Express in launchSettings.json.

UseLocalDB.Description: Whether to use LocalDB instead of SQLite. This option only applies if --auth Individual or --auth IndividualB2C is specified.

skipRestore.Description: If specified, skips the automatic restore of the project on create.
